Products.body: Neurocache consists of two standalone web applications: 'Neurocache Hub' and 'Neurocache Api'. These platforms allow users to create, train, and customize their own AI agents.

Website.body: neurocache.ai is where the creation and training of Ai agents takes place. The users agents are uploaded to api.neurocache.ai and from there the user can access their agents from their own code.

Intro.body: Neurocache Hub is a full-stack web application. It includes a real-time chat for users to assemble groups of agents, and a dashboard for managing agents, creating Api keys, and viewing usage data.

Usage.body: Users can create teams of AI agents with unique specializations in the Hub, and test their creations in real-time with other users in a group chat setting.

Stack.body: Next.js, TypeScript, Axios, React Query, MobX, Supabase Postgres, Supabase, Upstash Redis, Upstash, Socket.io (maybe Supabase), Jest, Pnpm, Vercel, Tailwind.css, Flowbite, React Three Fiber, Framer motion.

Intro.body: The Neurocache Api is a public, secured Api service. It enables users to interact with their AI agents and is equipped with a rich library of AI-powered abilities.

Usage.body: The Neurocache Api serves as the brain of Neurocache, enabling users to communicate with their AI agents from any codebase.

Stack.body: Python, FastAPI, Google Cloud Platform, FastAPI-Security, Pytest, Poetry, GitHub Actions, SlowApi, Nginx, and several AI Technologies.
